column1: Uchi////We finally manage to make a reservation on Monday night at Uchi. They live up to the hype and we had a wonderful experience. Walu walu is a bit overcooked but when you scooped the broth and eat it
column2: then it offset the dryness of the fish. Avo bake was not that great
column3: don't order it. Crispy Brussels sprout with lime chili. If you have not tasted Brussels sprout or dislike it before
column4: then this will change your mind. We can't stop nibble on them. We tried one of their daily special menu which is eggplant maki
column5: it was good especially the sambal olek dressing.
